scripts.build: pnpm run fetch:medium && astro build --silent && node scripts/fix-urls.js
scripts.build:safe: node scripts/fetch-medium.js && astro build --silent && node scripts/fix-urls.js
scripts.package:win: pnpm run build && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path * -DestinationPath ../trailblazer-analytics-dist.zip -Force && cd ..
scripts.package:unix: pnpm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../trailblazer-analytics-dist.zip . && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx gh-pages -d dist
scripts.deploy:clean:
astro build --silent && npx gh-pages -d dist --remove "**\!(.git|.|..)" --no-history && echo '
âœ… Clean deployment to www.trailblazeranalytics.com completed.'
